content: (maar aprem - aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa.. Enna pole)

Paurohithya padaunnathyam parishodhichadbhuthamaarnnen
Maalaakhaagnimayanmaaril pattakkaaran shreshdhathaman.
Puriyil thanne kaanumpoll ooronnaake viraykkunnu.
Aalayavaathil thurakkumpoll vaanidavaathil thurakkunnu.
Roohaaye villikkumneram melilninnu parannu varum
Kartthrshareeratthil theeyum kaasaayil jvaalayumund.
Aachaaryan than maddhyatthil mochanakarmmam cheyyunnu.
Doshikall kenchi poruthikkaayu thirumeyu praapicheedunnu.

Aachaaryanmaarkkaashvaasam nalkenam naathhaa!
Siddhanmaarodoppam nithyaavaasam thannil.
Vaangippoyorkkuththhaanatthin naallil jeevan
Eki thejovasthram nalkunnone! Sthothram.
Aachaaryaalangkaaratthe paathaallam pokki
Shemmaashshanmaar thanmaahaathmyam paade neekki.
Sabhayin thozhar paathaallatthil mannaayu poyi;
Innaall veenaanaadam poypoyu maunam poondu.
Sabhayilninnum geethodghosham kellkkunnilla;
Devaagaare gaanaalaapam shoonyappettu.
Vaavittayyo! Kezhunnaachaaryasthhaanangall
Naadaabhaave shuddhasthhaanam keneedunnu.
Lokam vittoraachaaryanmaar ninnodoppam
Saaghosham nee vanneedumpoll modikkenam.
Kaanaathaayor bhraathaakkanmaar vijnyanmaarum
Sthhaanam pookenam siddhanmaaroppam raajye.
Sthothraalaapam haaleluyyaapoorvvam naathhaa!
Aachaaryanmaar martthyanmaar chernnetteedatte.
Bhoolokatthil sthhaanam kollllum sabhayil ninnum
Aadyajar koodum sabhayil naathhaa cherttheedenam
Aachaaryeshan mashihaa! Rahasyam shushrooshicha
Pattakkaaril krpa cheyyenam naathhaa! Sthothram.
